backend/main.mo: Defines a large set of shared types for activities, reminders, finances, habits, journals, dashboards, and user profiles within the main actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature requirements to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and base styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling theme, authentication, profile setup gating, and switching between daily and main dashboard views.
frontend/src/components/activities/Daily: Displays a visual daily timeline of timed activities with hour markers and colored segments.
frontend/src/components/AppButton.tsx: Wrapper around the UI Button component adding consistent app-wide styling via the app-button class.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Monthly calendar component with reminder indicators, month navigation, and date selection.
frontend/src/components/charts/PiePercen: Custom rendering function for Recharts pie chart slice percentage labels, positioned inside slices.
frontend/src/components/DailyDashboard.t: Renders the daily dashboard with tabbed sections for overview, activities, finance, habits, and journal, using the selected date.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component with styled container and placeholder content.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, theme toggle, and user profile menu, supporting login state and view switching.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login button that triggers Internet Identity login, handles stale sessions, and shows loading state.
frontend/src/components/MainDashboard.ts: Main dashboard showing trends and charts for finances, habits, activities, and time spent with selectable timeframes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating or repairing a user profile by setting a username and saving via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/sections/DailyOv: Aggregates activities, finances, habits, and journal data for a selected date and displays multiple pie charts summarizing daily distributions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Finance: Manages daily finance entries with create/delete actions and displays a pie chart summarizing income, expenses, and investments.
frontend/src/components/sections/HabitsS: Handles daily habits with create/update/delete functionality and shows completion stats via a pie chart.
frontend/src/components/sections/Journal: Loads, edits, and saves a daily journal entry with identity checks and autosync behavior.
frontend/src/components/sections/Overvie: Displays and manages daily activities, including creation, deletion, grouping, and timeline visualization.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reminde: Creates and lists daily reminders with delete functionality and a simple UI for managing entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Detects whether the viewport width is below 768px and updates on resize.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, activities, and related backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, CSS variables for themes, and base typography and component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/activityColors.ts: Provides deterministic OKLCH-based colors for activities using a string hash.
frontend/src/utils/activityTime.ts: Utilities for parsing times and sorting activities by time-of-day.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/localDate.ts: Utilities for working with local YYYY-MM-DD dates without timezone shifts.
frontend/src/utils/timelineStyles.ts: Generates gradient and glow styles for timeline segments based on OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash for sessionâ€‘scoped state like tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata describing DailyOS features, architecture, and existing functional modules with versioned capability definitions.
